titles.title: Expressing the support of the House of Representatives for programs and activities to prevent perpetrators of fraud from victimizing senior citizens.
Expressing the support of the House of Representatives for programs and activities to prevent perpetrators of fraud from victimizing senior citizens.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

bill.summary: Expresses support for programs and activities to prevent perpetrators of fraud from victimizing senior citizens and to educate and inform senior citizens, their families, their care-givers, and the public about fraud perpetrated through mail, telemarketing, and the Internet.
